name: SCREW-NUT
description:
SCREW-NUT - This is a game in which you need to melt the nut
Your task is to move the nut to the hot platform after which it will melt.


Features:
- Beautiful 3d graphics
- Beautiful Visual effects
- Physical Puzzle
- 45+ levels
- Low system requirements

BITRAY2
SugarBox

Music - Anatoly Loginovskikh
